Hey, I’m Vasco! 👋🏼

A web designer and developer, creating things on the internet from the beautiful city of Lisbon.

Currently working at Hole19 Golf, where we’re making products for golfers to improve their game.

I’m also building a community for old Volkswagen lovers, helping to grow JekyllThemes, learning JavaScript and writing on my blog.

If I’m not in front of a screen, I’m probably getting dirty fixing my old cars, reading a non-fiction book, or hanging out with my friends.
